Name: Crazy Appliances 疯狂电器
About the game: CRAZY APPLIANCES is a fast paced top-down shooter game! The elect robots are insane, heroes! Fight your way by using various weapons and powerful items to defeat them in different dangerous situation! Features Smooth control, fast paced shooting experience! various gameplay, watch up for the trap heroes! Each boss has unique ability, they are challenging, can you defeat them? Each character has exclusive skill and tailor-made weapon, choose your own style! Each weapon are unique and powerful, you could also get weapon when defeat the boss! Items bring more possibilities to the fight. Real-time upgrading system and shop help players to upgrade their characters strategically. Remember to response wisely and carefully to different sudden occurrences! Pixel arts with 8-bit music
